tool.name: tools
tool.command:
parsec tools get_tools
#if $tool_id: --tool_id "$tool_id" #end if #if $name: --name "$name" #end if #if $trackster: $trackster #end if
| jq -S . > $results

param.name: trackster
param.label: trackster
param.help: if True, only tools that are compatible with Trackster are returned

tool.help: Get all tools or filter the specific one(s) via the provided ``name`` or ``tool_id``. Provide only one argument, ``name`` or ``tool_id``, but not both.
